name: Robotic Rewind (iAMmincho)
description:
Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 47.
Robots collecting coins. When a robot collect a coin, it will rewind and replay its moves. Use this to your advantage to beat all levels in this puzzle platformer.

Controls:

WASD - move M - mute Esc - menu

Game description:

When you collect a coin, your robot will rewind and replay all its moves. You can interact with the replay by standing on its head. Collecting a coin of a certain color will send you to the spawn point of the corresponding color. Collect all coins to beat a level.

If the game lags, consider downloading the game.
